alert.note: Alert for Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 12:41AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Withlacoochee At SR 200 Holder affecting Citrus County. For the Withlacoochee...at SR 200 Holder...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee At SR 200 Holder. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Arrowhead subdivision floods with water in homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 5.13 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage on Saturday and continue rising to 8.4 feet on Sunday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Withlacoochee SR 200 Holde 8.0 5.1 Wed 11 pm 6.6 7.8 8.4 8.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued as needed.
